The other discussion going reminded me of a discussion we had internally
about the atompub protocol. By protocol you should post things to the feed.
If we are actually idempotent and everything is a create (say a collection
of events where you always 201) wouldn't a put make this more obvious?

Cheers,

Greg

-- 
Studying for the Turing test

--047d7b34309428e73304fdc7c6bd
